label.phrase: one of my favorite hacks is from a contributor rich lefko after he left a job he wanted to keep his work data he used a pc at work without having to buy a windows pc rich's hack was brilliant he discovered a way to swap out the hard drive of the macbook and install the hard drive from work and boot into windows so now on the rare occasions he wants a windows machine he just switches out the drive in his macbook
